mapper.select: select * from replyboard where board_no=#{boardNo} order by Reply_no desc,reply_Date desc
select * from replyboard where rref=#{rref} order by RSTEP asc,reply_Date
mapper.insert: insert into replyboard values(REPLY_no_seq.nextval,#{memberId},#{replyContent},default,#{boardNo}, #{rref},(select rstep from (select * from replyboard where board_no=#{boardNo} order by rstep ) where rownum =1)+1,2)
mapper.update: update replyboard set reply_Content = #{replyContent}, reply_date = sysdate where reply_No =#{replyNo}
mapper.delete: delete from replyboard where reply_No =#{replyNo} or rref=${replyNo}
